data.question: What is the chemical formula for Fe-MOF?
What method was used for the synthesis of Fe-MOF?
What is the space group of Im-Fe-MOF?
What is the proton conductivity of Im-Fe-MOF at 60 °C and 98% RH?
How does the proton conductivity of Im-Fe-MOF compare to Nafion under similar conditions?
data.answer: Im-Fe-MOF has a higher proton conductivity than Nafion under similar conditions.

data.question: What is the role of imidazole in the synthesis of Im-Fe-MOF?
data.answer: Imidazole acts as a ligand coordinating to the metal nodes of the framework.

data.question: Is the proton conductivity of Im-Fe-MOF higher than that of Fe-MOF?
Does the Fe-MOF structure contain water molecules?
Is the activation energy for proton conduction in Im-Fe-MOF lower than in Fe-MOF?
Was X-ray crystallography used to determine the structure of Fe-MOF and Im-Fe-MOF?
What is the activation energy (Ea) for proton conduction in Im-Fe-MOF?
What is the crystal system of Fe-MOF?
Does the synthesis of Im@Fe-MOF involve immersing Fe-MOF in a methanol solution of imidazole?
What is the role of acetic acid in the synthesis of Fe-MOF?
data.answer: Acetic acid acts as a competing reagent in the solvo-thermal synthesis.

data.question: Is the proton conductivity of Im-Fe-MOF affected by relative humidity?
What is the main difference between Im@Fe-MOF and Im-Fe-MOF in terms of imidazole incorporation?
data.answer: In Im@Fe-MOF, imidazole is physically adsorbed, while in Im-Fe-MOF, imidazole is chemically coordinated.

data.question: What technique was used to measure the proton conductivity of the MOFs?
Does the presence of coordinated imidazole in Im-Fe-MOF enhance its proton conductivity compared to Fe-MOF?
What is the effect of temperature on the proton conductivity of Im-Fe-MOF?
data.answer: The proton conductivity of Im-Fe-MOF increases with temperature.

data.question: Is the proton conductivity of Im-Fe-MOF stable after being washed with water?
